verses.verse: Behold, <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> hath <S%G1325>bestowed<s%> upon <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we should be <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3756>not.<s%>
